item.title: Columbia Care Inc 10-K
item.description: Columbia Care Inc, which is in the Agriculture Production - Crops [0100] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 31, 2022 had 88747 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
